nodes.text: The Governor of Caluula was a female Galactic Alliance governor of Caluula during the end of the Yuuzhan Vong War. In 29 ABY after the Battle of Caluula, she made a deal with the Yuuzhan Vong that would allow them to occupy Caluula in exchange for not using surge-coral and allowing scientists onworld to witness the Nocturne of the Winged-Stars. The decision made her extremely disliked among the populace, and she retreated behind her walled headquarters. However, in actuality she agreed to the peaceful occupation in order to provide a base for the testing of the Alpha Red virus.
